Summary: {nd} 2 events 30min.apart,2 orbs next to capital bldg in austin,30 later observed hugh lite craft
divs: Sighting Detailsat 5:30 pm in austin,tx observed 2 orbs close to the state capital bldg. i have a photo of them. as my wife and i were driving home in rush hour traffic, we saw extremely bright,glowing cigar shaped object. we were heading north on 183 in cedar park. the object was shimmering pale colors mostly pink and light orange. we got a picture of it and pulled over out of traffic. but when we got out of the vehicle it was gone. someone else must have seen this also.
